name: Imperial Ward
desc: Reduces damage taken by 75% unless damage is an elemental combo.
components: (has_skill(unit, 'Frozen') and ('Blade' in unit2.tags or 'Warhammer' in unit2.tags or 'Greatlance' in unit2.tags)) or (has_skill(unit, 'Seared') and 'Wind' in target.get_weapon().tags) or (has_skill(unit, 'Shadowblight') and 'Light' in target.get_weapon().tags) or (has_skill(unit, 'Drench_Debuff') and 'Thunder' in target.get_weapon().tags)
